column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zuko says : " Shelter . "
#Text=Aang says : " Roku , the Water Tribe 's under attack .
#Text=They crossed over the Spirit World to the mortal world very near the beginning .
#Text=There is only one spirit I know of who is old enough to remember .
#Text=" Aang says : " Who ?
#Text=" Roku says : " The spirit 's name is Koh , but he is very dangerous .
#Text=They call him the Face Stealer .
#Text=When you speak with him , you must be very careful to show no emotion at all .
#Text=Not the slightest expression , or he will steal your face .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I finally have you , but I ca n't get you home because of this blizzard .
#Text=There 's always something .
#Text=Not that you would understand .
#Text=You 're like my sister .
#Text=Everything always came easy to her .
#Text=She 's a firebending prodigy , and everyone adores her .
#Text=My father says she was born lucky .
#Text=He says I was lucky to be born .
#Text=I do n't need luck , though .
#Text=I do n't want it .
#Text=I 've always had to struggle and fight and that 's made me strong .
#Text=It 's made me who I am .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I do n't need to remind you we have a time limit .
#Text=If we do n't defeat the Water Tribe before the full moon rises , they will be undefeatable .
#Text=" Zhao says : " I assure you I have everything under control .
#Text=I intend to remove the moon as a factor .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Remove the moon ?
#Text=How ?
#Text=" Hahn says : " Admiral Choi !
#Text=Prepare to meet your fate !
#Text=" Zhao says : " As I was saying , years ago I stumble upon a great and powerful secret : the identity of the Moon Spirit 's mortal form .
#Text=" Iroh says : " What ?
#Text=" Zhao says : " I was a young lieutenant serving under General Shu in the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=I discovered a hidden library .
#Text=Underground , in fact .
#Text=I tore through scroll after scroll .
#Text=One of them contained a detailed illustration , and the words " moon " and " ocean " .
#Text=I knew then that these spirits could be found and killed .
#Text=And that it was my destiny to do so .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Zhao , the spirits are not to be trifled with !
#Text=" Zhao says : " Yes , yes ... I know you fear the spirits , Iroh .
#Text=I 've heard rumors about your journey into the Spirit World .
#Text=But the Ocean and Moon gave up their immortality to become a part of our world .
#Text=And now they will face the consequences .
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're just a curly tailed blue nose .
#Text=" Aang says : " Aaahhh !
#Text=Show no fear .
#Text=Show no emotion at all .
#Text=" Aang says : " Hello ?
#Text=I - I 'm looking for a spirit named ' Koh ' .
#Text=" Koh says : " Welcome !
#Text=" Aang says : " Thank you .
#Text=" Koh says : " My old friend , the Avatar .
#Text=It 's been a long time .
#Text=" Aang says : " You know me ?
#Text=" Koh says : " How could I forget you ?
#Text=One of your previous incarnations tried to slay me !
#Text=Nearly eight or nine hundred years ago .
#Text=" Aang says : " I did n't know that .
#Text=Why did he , or I , try to kill you ?
#Text=" Koh says : " Oh , it was something about stealing the face of someone you loved .
#Text=Of course , that 's all behind us .
#Text=Why should I hold a grudge against you for something in a past life ?
#Text=After all , you 're a different person now .
#Text=You 've come to me ... with a new face .
#Text="
